Daniel Hemphill

Web Developer

About

I'm a web developer based in Olathe, Kansas. I'm currently in a coding bootcamp focused on Boostrap, REACT, and NodeJS frameworks. I'm a quick learner and I can figure out just about anything I set my mind to!

I'm also a Scouter and a project manager at heart. I love the outdoors and working with youth, and teaching them new skills.

I am able to make sites that last and are "unsensorable" because of a technology called IPFS. If you would like to learn more, please reach out, and we can talk!
